select k.adminid, a.username AS adminname, a.parentid, p.username as parentname, k.keysetid, s.keyname, count(k.status) as 'total', sum(case when k.status='LOCKED' then 1 else 0 end) as 'locked', sum(case when k.status='USED' then 1 else 0 end) as 'used', sum(case when k.status='DELETED' then 1 else 0 end) as 'deleted'
from kss_soft_key k left join kss_admin a on a.id=k.adminid left join kss_admin p on p.id=a.parentid left join kss_keyset s on k.keysetid=s.id
(k.adminid = #{adminid} or a.parentid=#{adminid} or p.parentid=#{adminid} )
group BY k.adminid, a.username, a.parentid, p.username, k.keysetid, s.keyname
